summary:
This is a bit a remake of ACE Combat Skills ( I made everything by myself and put much more in it.)
- Changes Bows to Short and Long Bows; Crossbows to Heavy and Light
- many new Weapons (Warglaives, Short Swords, Battle Staves,Weapons of the 3rd Era)
- Silver Perk Reworked
-
descriptionHtml:
My mods:

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46450/?
]Papa Timm - Archery and Combat[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48963/?
]Papa Timm - Magic & Misc[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52797/?
]Papa Timm - Alchemy and Loot[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54402/?
]Papa Timm - Thievery[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]

[color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55562/?
]Papa Timm - Enemies and Races[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]


[color=Green][b][size=6][center][i]Papa Timm - Archery and Combat[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]

[size=3][b]In Short[/b][/size]

[b]This mod changes:[/b]

1. Bows and Crossbows are devided into Short (Cross)Bows (Small Dam, High Crit Dam) and Long (Cross) Bows (High Dam, Slow Draw Time)
2. Arrows are devided into Long and Short Arrows; Bolts are devided into Light and Heavy Bolts (Arrows can be Sharpened and do after that doube Damage.)
3. 2 Handed Weapons get for every Type special Perks with special Effects
4. 1 Handed Weapons get for every Type special Perks with special Efects. Also get fighting Stances like Spellsword and Duelist.
5. Light Armor and Heavy Armor made interessting (e.g. Wearing Armor makes Spell casting or Sneaking harder.)
6. Blocking Skill Tree now makes Wards stronger.
7. Hand To Hand Combat changed. You can Block now and do a Special Bash Attack.
8. Thanks to [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51920/?
]Interrupt attack for better blocking by Moljka [/url][/size][/b][/color] you may interrupt an attack.
9. Ancient Nord Weapons do extra Damage to the Living with a chance to absorb some Live.
10. Falmer Weapons do extra Poison Damage to everyone.

[b]This Mod adds:[/b]

1. Many new Weapons: Short Swords, Sabers, Waskizashis, Nodachis, Katanas, Battle Staves, Battle Mage Staves, WarGlaives, New Bows and Arrows.
2. New Special Weapons with special Look
3. New special Magic Rings with custom Meshes and Textures
4. In the Light Armor Tree a new Martial Arts Perk Tree
5. Silver Perk with more Powers with it (Blocking makes a Ward.)
6. New Animations for H2H Kombat.
7. New Crossbows
8. New Arrows. (Hunting Arrow with special Damage to Animals, Silver Arrows with secial Damage to Undead,...)
9. Shooting non Silver Arrows with a Silver Bow does not extra Damage to Undead. But Bashing with a Silver Bow does extra Damage to Undead and slows them a bit.
10. The Silver Moons Forge can now really forge Lunar Weapons. Every Iron, Steel and Glass Weapon is forgable at night only.

[color=Green][b][size=3]Good to know[/size][/b][/color]

- All weapons added by this mod can be found in the world. They are added to many level Lists.
- If you want to forge the Weapons Of The 3rd Era you must at first read the Book „Weapons Of The 3rd Era“. I made this, because many other mods are using those weapons. If you do not want them in your Forge list, so do not read the Book.
- You can find this book near the Silent Moons Forge and in some other places.
- I added some special Rings. Not all I want, but some. When I play more the Game, I will find some places to hide more Unique Rings with Unique Powers.

- I know I remade [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10037/?
]ACE - Combat Skills by Athyra - ACE Team[/url][/size][/b][/color]. I did it, because I wanted it all in one esp. And of course it is one of the best mods out there!!! I changed of course many things, but the core is the same.

- Also I wanted to add all Weapons from other mods I love. So I do not have to make compatibility patches. I save with this many esps because of the weapons. I have to say, that I used all low res textures from the original mod. If you want the Weapons in High res, you have to download the original mod and copy their Textures.

-Special thanks to [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1607183/?
]Etayorius[/url][/size][/b][/color]. Without him my mods would not exist. And my description would be without colour and everything else.

[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]01.Prolog – 02.Archery[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]03.One-Handed – 04.Two-Handed[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]05.Unarmed – 06.Light Armour[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]07.Heavy Armour – 08.Block[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]09.Fighting Effects – 10.Magic Weapons[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]11.Silver Perk – 12.Silent Moons Forge[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]13.Installation – 14.Compatibility[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]
[color=Green][b][size=3][center][i]15.Credits – 16.Recommended[/i][/center][/size][/b][/color]


[color=Green][b][size=3]01.Prolog[/size][/b][/color]

At first I want to thank all the Modders, who helped me and let me use their Ideas, Meshes and Textures. I am really bad in designing. So I asked many many people, whether I could use their work. Most of them said yes. Without them, my mod would be less than nothing.

Every Single new Texture, every single new Mesh and every single new Animation is not from me but from other great modders. I included them into my mod, so you do not have to install their mods. You should of course download them, to endorse them afterwards.

All modding was made by me. I had some ideas, some Ideas I used from other mods. But I have to say, I made everything myself and I just use some Ideas I was fond of. Often I changed the Idea from another great modder and formed it for me.

This Mod does not use any SCRIPTS. I added all the Perks and Abilities into One Universal Perk and gave this Perk into an MGEF. This Effect I placed into the Unique Ability every Race has. So I did not change any Race, only the one ability ever Race has (e.g. Into the Fire Resistance of Dark Elfs, or the Highborn Ability of High Elfs. So it is compatible with every Race Mod, that does not change or delete the special Ability of a Race.

This mod can be seen as a bit overpowered. So is my Magic Module (See under Point 16). This is because I play with many mods, whitch make the opponent extremly dangerous. My Enemies and Races Module for example (See under Point 16)


[color=Green][b][size=3]02.Archery[/size][/b][/color]

[color=yellow]The things I am extrem proud of[/color]
I made special Arrows, most of them with Meshes and Textures from others.
The special Thing is, that many of them have special Spells on it.
Normaly you enchant your Bow and the Arrows do the magic damage of the Bow. I changed that.

Now a Silver Arrow shot by a Hunters Bow does extrem damage to Undead.
Or a Draugr Arrow does extra Damge to living.
So does a Hunters Arrow extra Damage to Animals.
I also added a Arrow, that weakens the enemies Magic Resistance.
Falmer Arrows do all Poison Damage.
And some more Arrows with special abilities.

[color=yellow]Other things[/color]
Many new Bows were added and categorized into Short or Longbows.
Many Crossbows were added and categorized into Light and Heavy Crossbows.
Also many Arrows were added and categorized into Short and Long Arrows
Many Bolts were added and categorized into Light and Heavy Bolts.

I splited the Perk Tree into Sort and Long Bows. (See Picture)

For more details look for the Readme.


_________[b]Longbows[/b]___[b]Shortbows[/b]
[b]Damage:[/b]___x1,5_________/2
[b]Weight:[/b]____+5__________/2
[b]Speed:[/b]_____0,6_________1,2
[b]Range:[/b]_____9000________7000
[b]Crit:[/b]_______/2__________x4

[color=yellow][b]Longbows[/b][/color]

- Ignores 10 % of Armor if your Longbow uses Long Arrows
- 10 % higher Damage when using the matching Arrow to the Bow
(e.g. Iron Arrow with Iron Bow; Ivory Bow with Elven Ebony Arrows or Elven Elmwood Arrows)
- 30 % higher Damage when using Elmwood Arrows with an ElmwoodWar Bow
- 20% penalty, if you have a missmatch (Long Bow; Short Arrow)
- The Critical Damage of Long Bows levels 25% of your Skill
(for 4 Points of Archery you gain 1 point of Damage)
- Sneaking with a Long Bow Equipped is 40% harder
- Sneak Attacks do only 1,5 x Damage (with Perk 3X)

[color=yellow][b]Shortbows[/b][/color]

- 25 % higher critical Damage when using Short Arrow with Short Bow
- 10 % higher Damage when using the matching Arrow to the Bow (e.g. Elven Arrow with Elven Bow)
- 30 % higher Damage when using Redwood Arrows with Redwood Bow
- The Critical Damage of Short Bows levels 50% of your Skill
(for 2 Points of Archery you gain 1 point of Damage)
- 2 x higher Sneaking Damage (4 without any Perk, 6 with...)
- 20 % Damage Penalty when using Short Bows with Long Arrows

[color=yellow][b]Light Crossbows[/b][/color]

[b]- The same as Short Bows, but:[/b]
* Zooms only like Short Bow Eagle Eye first Perk
* Zooming does not use Stamina
* Much lower Distance
* Fires 20 % slower than Short Bows
* 25 % Armor Piercing

[color=yellow][b]Heavy Crossbows[/b][/color]

[b]- The same as Short Bows, but:[/b]
* No Sneak Penalty
* Zooms only like Short Bow Eagle Eye first Perk
* Zooming does not use Stamina
* Much lower Distance
* Fires 20 % faster than Long Bows
* 25 % Armor Piercing

[color=Green][b][size=3]03.One-Handed[/size][/b][/color]

- half Stamina when Power Attacking
- half Damage, when Power Attacking
- The Perk Tree was changed (See Picture)

Many new Swords were added ( See readme for details)


[color=yellow][b]One Handed Weapons[/b][/color]

Every One-Handed Weapon has now its own feeling:

[color=Green][b]Daggers:[/b][/color] Reach [b]0,7[/b]; Speed [b]1,3[/b]; Stagger: [b]0[/b]; Damage: [b]0[/b]; Weight: [b]0[/b]; Crit Dam: ; Crit Multi: [b]1,5[/b]

[color=Green][b]Tantos:[/b][/color] Reach [b]0,8[/b]; Speed [b]1,25[/b]; Stagger: [b]0[/b]; Damage: [b]+1[/b]; Weight: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]=Dam[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]0[/b];

[color=Green][b]Waskizashis:[/b][/color] Reach [b]0,9;[/b] Speed [b]1,2[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,50[/b]; Damage: [b]-2[/b]; Weight: [b]-3[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]+1[/b];Crit Multi: [b]1,5[/b];

[color=Green][b]Short Sword:[/b][/color] Reach [b]0,9[/b]; Speed [b]1,1[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,50[/b]; Damage: [b]0[/b]; Weight: [b]-2[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1,2[/b];

[color=Green][b]Sabre:[/b][/color] Reach [b]1[/b]; Speed [b]1,1[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,55[/b]; Damage: [b]-1[/b]; Weight: [b]-1[/b];Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1,2[/b];

[color=Green][b]Sword:[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1[/b]; Speed: [b]1[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,75[/b]; Damage: [b]0[/b] Weight: [b]0[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Katana:[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1[/b]; Speed: [b]1,05[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,70[/b]; Damage: [b]0[/b]; Weight: [b]0[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Longsword 1H:[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1,1[/b]; Speed: 0,9 [b]1[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,9[/b]; Damage: [b]+2[/b] Weight:[b]+5[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Scimitar:[/b][/color] Reach: [b]0,9[/b]; Speed: [b]1,05[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,8[/b]; Damage: [b]+1[/b]; Weight: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Nodachi 1H:[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1,1[/b]; Speed: [b]1,0[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,5[/b]; Damage: [b]0[/b]; Weight: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Ninjato 1H:[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1,15[/b]; Speed: [b]1,0[/b]; Stagger: [b]0,5[/b]; Damage: [b]-1[/b]; Weight: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=yellow][b]Fighting Stances[/b][/color]

[color=yellow][b]Duelist:[/b][/color]
Equipped an One-Handed Weapon in one Hand and nothing in the other;
* You need the Fighting Stance Perk
- 5% higher Critical Hit chance
- 6% chance to dodge an attack
- 20% faster attack Speed

[color=yellow][b]Spellsword:[/b][/color]
Equipped an One-Handed Weapon in one Hand and a Spell in the other;
*You need the Fighting Stance Perk
- Any Spell equipped: 6% Chance to Paralyze the Target for 1 Sec

[color=Green][b][size=3]04.Two-Handed[/size][/b][/color]

- 1,2x Power Attack damage;
- 40% harder Sneaking when equipped Two Hand Weapon;
- 1,2x Stagger;
- Crit Damage levels 50% of your Two Hand Skill;
- The Perk Tree was changed (See Picture)

Many new Swords were added ( See readme for details)

[color=yellow][b]Two Handed Weapons[/b][/color]

Every Two-Handed Weapon has now its own feeling:

[color=Green][b]Longswords[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1,1[/b]; Speed: [b]0,9[/b]; Stagger: [b]1,0[/b]; Damage: [b]-1[/b]; Weight: [b]-2[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Nodachi[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1,2[/b]; Speed: [b]0,8[/b]; Stagger: [b]1,0[/b]; Damage: [b]0[/b]; Weight: [b]-1[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Greatsword[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1,3[/b]; Speed: [b]0,7[/b]; Stagger: [b]1,1[/b]; Damage: [b]0[/b]; Weight: [b]0[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]0[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];

[color=Green][b]Longblade[/b][/color] Reach: [b]1,3[/b]; Speed: [b]0,8[/b]; Stagger: [b]1,1[/b]; Damage: [b]+1[/b]; Weight: [b]0[/b]; Crit Dam: [b]+1[/b]; Crit Multi: [b]1[/b];


[color=Green][b][size=3]05.Unarmed[/size][/b][/color]

[color=yellow][b]Perks[/b][/color]

Without any weapon:
- [b]Evade[/b]: You can avoid attacks by leaping backward.
- [b]Martial Arts[/b]: Every Level you gain, your Hand To Hand Damage grows. Also your Critical Damage grows with your Light Armor Skill.
- [b]Ninja Tactics[/b]: Unarmed attacks with Light Armor gauntlets do their double armor rating in extra damage.
- [b]Unarmed Traning[/b]: Your Power Attacks cost 50 % less.

With bound Fists:
- [b]Unarmed Sweep Attack[/b]: Damage every Person standing before you while Power Attacking without Moving.
- [b]Dirty Tricks[/b]: Bashing in Hand To Hand has a chance of 30 % to get the Opponent to Fall. Punshing with your right, while sneaking does much more Damage.

With Elemental Fists
- [b]Fighters Of The Elements[/b]: Your Fists strike with the power of the Elements. The Skill increases with every Destruction Main Perk.

Fighting without Weapons is now interessting.
There is a new Perk Tree integrated into the [b]Light Armor Tree[/b]. Two Branches. ( See Picture)
The Main Branche is the one working really without any weapon. ([color=yellow][b]Evasion, Martial Arts, Ninja Tactics[/b][/color])
The other one needs a Weapon I created for this purpose. The Problem is, that you can not add WeaponHitSpells without a Weapon equipped.
For the Sweep Attack, the Dirty Tricks and The Fighter Of The Elements you need a weapon equipped.
You do not see the Weapon and you can not equip it yourself. I made a Bound Weapon out of it, with the Look of a Ring.
By Choosing [color=yellow]Martial Arts Sweep[/color] Perk you get the Spell Bound Fists. By casting it you have 2 Weapons Equipped.
Now every special Attack works. Also you can Level [b]Light Armor[/b] as a side effect.
By choosing [color=yellow]The Fighter Of The Elements[/color] you gain 3 Bound Fist Spells.
You can choose witch Element on which Hand you want to use.
[color=red]Fist Of Fire[/color], [color=blue]Fist Of Ice[/color] and [color=purple]Fist Of Shock[/color]. They have an Enchantment with Elemental Damage whitch is scaling with your Destruction Perks you have.

[color=yellow][b]Base Damage[/b][/color]: Fire: 10 ; Frost and Shock 05

- [color=green]Destruction Perk[/color]
______[color=yellow][b]Novice[/b][/color]; __[color=yellow][b]Apprentice[/b][/color]; ___[color=yellow][b]Adept[/b][/color]; ___[color=yellow][b]Expert[/b][/color]; ____[color=yellow][b]Master[/b][/color]
- Fire: 30 Damage; 40 Damage; 50 Damage; 60 Damage; 70 Damage;
- Ice: 15 Damage; 20 Damage; 25 Damage; 30 Damage; 35 Damage;
- Shock: 15 Damage; 20 Damage; 25 Damage; 30 Damage; 35 Damage;


[color=yellow][b]Other Features of Unarmed Combat[/b][/color]:

- Every Light Armor ingame gauntlet gives the Martial Arts Perk Bonus (Like Fists Of Steel in Heavy Armor Perk Tree)
- The Fists Of Steel Bonus was doubled
- [color=yellow]Blocking in Unarmed Combat[/color] is now possible. Holding the Left hand Attack, you block. Moving and hiting the Left Attack Button let you make a normal Left Hand Attack.
- Thanks to evanoblivion the Bashing Attack is now a fast Kick (only in 3rd Person)

[color=Green][b][size=3]06.Light Armor[/size][/b][/color]

Wearing Light Armor influences the Sneaking Skill and the Casting Skill:

[color=yellow][b]Sneaking[/b][/color] (Light Armor Skill)
______________[color=yellow][b]1 Piece[/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]2 Pieces [/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]3 Pieces[/b][/color]
[color=green][b]Skill 001-029[/b][/color][b] 05%[/b] harder__ [b]10%[/b] harder__ [b]20%[/b] harder
[color=green][b]Skill 030-069[/b][/color][b] no penalty[/b]__ [b]05 %[/b] harder__ [b]10%[/b] harder
[color=green][b]Skill 069-100[/b][/color] [b] no penalty[/b]__ [b]no penalty[/b]__ [b]no penalty[/b]

[color=yellow][b]Spell-Casting[/b][/color]
______________________[color=yellow][b]1 Piece[/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]2 Pieces[/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]3 Pieces[/b][/color]
[color=green][b]No Perk[/b][/color]______MagReg__10% slower___20% slower__30% slower
_________CostPenalty___05% - 15%___10% - 30%____20% -50%
[color=green][b]Spellsword1[/b][/color]__MagReg___07% slower__15% slower__25% slower
_________CostPenalty___nothing_____05% - 10%___10% -25%
[color=green][b]Spellsword2[/b][/color]__MagReg___05% slower__10% slower__20% slower
_________CostPenalty___nothing_____nothing_____05% -12%


[color=Green][b][size=3]07. Heavy Armour[/size][/b][/color]

Wearing Heavy Armor influences the Sneaking Skill, the Casting Skill and the Moement Speed:

[color=yellow][b]Sneaking[/b][/color] (Heavy Armor Skill)
______________[color=yellow][b]1 Piece[/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]2 Pieces [/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]3 Pieces[/b][/color]
[color=green][b]Skill 001-029[/b][/color][b] 20%[/b] harder__ [b]40%[/b] harder__ [b]80%[/b] harder
[color=green][b]Skill 030-069[/b][/color][b] 15%[/b]________ [b]30 %[/b] harder__ [b]60%[/b] harder
[color=green][b]Skill 069-100[/b][/color] [b] 10%[/b]________ [b]20%[/b]_________ [b]40%[/b]

[color=yellow][b]Running[/b][/color] (Heavy Armor Skill)
______________[color=yellow][b]1 Piece[/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]2 Pieces [/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]3 Pieces[/b][/color]
[color=green][b]Skill 001-029[/b][/color][b] 03%[/b] slower__ [b]06%[/b] slower__ [b]10%[/b] slower
[color=green][b]Skill 030-069[/b][/color][b] 00%[/b]________ [b]04 %[/b] slower__ [b]07%[/b] slower
[color=green][b]Skill 069-100[/b][/color] [b] 00%[/b]________ [b]00%[/b]_________ [b]05%[/b]

[color=yellow][b]Spell-Casting[/b][/color]
______________________[color=yellow][b]1 Piece[/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]2 Pieces[/b][/color]_____[color=yellow][b]3 Pieces[/b][/color]
[color=green][b]No Perk[/b][/color]______MagReg__15% slower___30% slower__50% slower
_________CostPenalty___06% - 30%___12% - 60%____20% - 100%
[color=green][b]Spellsword1[/b][/color]__MagReg___12% slower__25% slower__40% slower
_________CostPenalty___05% - 20%___08% - 40%___15% - 66%
[color=green][b]Spellsword2[/b][/color]__MagReg___10% slower__20% slower__30% slower
_________CostPenalty___nothing_____06% - 20%___10% - 33%


[color=Green][b][size=3]08. Block[/size][/b][/color]

Those changes can be find now in my other mod [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48963/?]Papa Timm - Magic & Misc[/url][/size][/b][/color]

[color=Green][b][size=3]09. Fighting Effects[/size][/b][/color]

This Module is made by myself. I must admit, that I did not had the Idea of it. I stole the Idea from ACE - Combat Skills.

What it makes?
It gives you some Situations influencing your Chars Stats and shows in Status Messages in your Magic Effects Menue.

Armor Status
[color=yellow][b]01 - Wearing Heavy Armor:[/color][/b] Your Heavy Armor leaves enemies a 10% chance to do 50% more damage.
[color=yellow][b]01 - Wearing Light Armor:[/color][/b] Your Light Armor leaves enemies a 20% chance to do 50% more damage and a 5% chance to hit a vital area.
[color=yellow][b]01 - Wearing Low Armor:[/color][/b] You are not wearing enough Armor, leaving Enemies a 35% chance to 50% more damage and a 15% chance to hit an vital area.

Movement Status
[color=yellow][b]02 - Running:[/color][/b] Running does not incure any penalties, but you are no longer Prepared for Combat.
[color=yellow][b]02 - Sleeping:[/color][/b] While sleeping you can not resist any damage and all attacks against you are a critical hit and cause twice as much stagger
[color=yellow][b]02 - Sneaking:[/color][/b] While sneaking you have a <33%> chance to take <50%> more damage, a <+10%> chance of receiving a critical hit, and get staggered <35%> more.
[color=yellow][b]02 - Sprinting:[/color][/b] While sprinting, incomming attacks have a chance to make you fall, especially those from the side and behind.
[color=yellow][b]02 - Drawn Weapon Running:[/color][/b] Running or Sprinting is 10% slower with a Weapon drawn (Except Daggers).
[color=yellow][b]02 - Low Health:[/color][/b] Your Health is below <33%>. Because of this your Stamina regenerates 30% slower and your movement speed is reduced by 10%.
[color=yellow][b]02 - Low Stamina:[/color][/b] Your Stamina is below <25%>. Because of this incoming Attacks cause 50% more stagger and your movement speed is reduced by 15%.

Weapon Status
[color=yellow][b]03 - Weapon Drawn:[/color][/b] You are prepared for combat with your weapon drawn. You get a <10%> chance to take half damage, get staggered <15%> less, and you are <5%> less likely to get hit in a vital area.
[color=yellow][b]03 - Weapon Sheated:[/color][/b] While you are not concentrated on fighting you have a <+25%> chance to take <50%> more damage, <+5%> chance of receiving a critical hit and get staggered <25%> more. Evade an Attack for <30%>, if your Carry Weight is under 31.
[color=yellow][b]03 - Concentrated Casting:[/color][/b] While you are concentrated in casting you have a <+25%> chance to take <60%> more damage, <+10%> chance of receiving a critical hit and get staggered <25%> more. Increase any casting skill to 50 to become a Battlemage, to avoid this penalty.
[color=yellow][b]03 - Power Attacking:[/color][/b] While you are Power Attacking you have a <+25%> chance to take <50%> more damage, <+15%> chance of receiving a critical hit and get staggered <35%> more. Increase either melee skill to 50 to avoid this penalty.
[color=yellow][b]03 - Weapon Stagger:[/color][/b] While you are staggered you have a <+25%> chance to take <55%> more damage, <+11%> chance of receiving a critical hit and get staggered <26%> more.
[color=yellow][b]03 - Drawn 2 Hand Weapon Running:[/color][/b] Running or Sprinting is 5% slower with a 2 Hand Weapon drawn.

It gives you directional Damage.
[color=yellow][b]Side attacks[/color][/b] +10% 1.5x dmg, +10% stagger
[color=yellow][b]Rear Attacks[/color][/b] +20% 1.5x dmg, +20% stagger, +10% chance to fall; 100% Chance to do a critical Attack. The Damage is without Perk x3. With 2 Handed Weapons, Maces, Axes allways x3. With Daggers and Swords and the Back Stab Perk x6 and with the Assassins Blade Perk x15.

[color=yellow][b]While Blocking[/color][/b] Rear +25% 1.5x dmg, no +stagger from sides


[color=Green][b][size=3]10. Weapons with Magic Effects[/size][/b][/color]

At first I changed some existing Weapons, to be ineressting enough for later gameplay.
I did not give them any enchantment. So the Weapons can normaly be enchanted but save the special Effect.

[color=yellow][b]Falmer Weapons:[/color][/b]
- [color=Green]Attacking:[/color] With a chance of [b]25%[/b] they can poison your enemies and do [b]40[/b] Points of Poison Damage. There is a [b]10%[/b] chance of slowing enemies down for [b]5[/b] Seconds.
All Falmer Weapons are affected. (Also Arrows)
- [color=Green]Bashing:[/color] With a Chance of [b]100%[/b] they can poison your Enemies and do [b]40[/b] Points of Poison Damage. Slow them down for [b]5[/b] Seconds.
Two Handed Weapons are affected.

[color=yellow][b]Ancient Nord Weapons:[/color][/b]
- [color=Green]Attacking:[/color] With a chance of [b]15%[/b] they can do [b]60[/b] Points of Dark Damage only to the living. There is a [b]10%[/b] chance of absorbing [b]10[/b] Points of Health.
All Ancient Nord Weapons are affected. (Also Arrows)
- [color=Green]Bashing:[/color] With a chance of [b]100%[/b] they can do [b]60[/b] Points of Dark Damage only to the living. With every Bash they absorb [b]10[/b] Points of Health.
Two-Handed Ancient Nord Weapons are affected.

And second I made new Weapons with Textures and Meshes of some very talented modders and designers (See the Credits Section)
I did not give them any enchantment. So the Weapons can normaly be enchanted but save the special Effect.

[color=yellow][b]Witch Hunter Weapons:[/color][/b]
- [color=Green]Attacking:[/color] With a chance of [b]50%[/b] they can draw your enemies Magicka by [b]40[/b] Points.
All Witch Hunter Weapons are affected.
- [color=Green]Bashing:[/color] With a Chance of [b]100%[/b] they can can draw your enemies Magicka by [b]10[/b] Points.
Two-Handed Witch Hunter Weapons are affected.

[color=yellow][b]Quicksilver Weapons:[/color][/b]
- [color=Green]Attacking:[/color] With a chance of [b]50%[/b] they can draw your enemies Stamina by [b]32[/b] Points.
All Quicksilver Weapons are affected.
- [color=Green]Bashing:[/color] With a Chance of [b]100%[/b] they can can draw your enemies Stamina by [b]8[/b] Points.
Two-Handed Quicksilver Weapons are affected.

[color=yellow][b]Raven Weapons:[/color][/b]
- [color=Green]Attacking:[/color] With a chance of [b]100%[/b] they can draw [b]40[/b] Points of Health only at Night Time.
All Raven Weapons are affected.
- [color=Green]Bashing:[/color] With a Chance of [b]100%[/b] they can can draw [b]10[/b] Points of Health only at Night Time. Slow only Undead Enemies down for [b]5[/b] Seconds only at Night Time.
Two-Handed Raven Weapons are affected.


At third I added Weapons to the World

[color=yellow][b]Dragon Katanas:[/color][/b]
You can find them in the world. Sometimes along the Main Quest, sometimes in Draugr Dungeons.
I added all Katanas with fitting Damage and Weight to my mod. Find the original Mod [color=green][b][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51349/?
]Dragon Katanas by MurdermiesteR[/url][/size][/b][/color]

They will get extra Enchantements against Dragons.

Oh, and what I want to say: MurdermiesteR is coooollll!!!!


[color=Green][b][size=3]11.Silver Perk[/size][/b][/color]

[b][color=yellow]Creatures, influenced by Silver:[/color][/b]
- Undead; - Werewolf; - Werebear; - Ghost; - Familiar
- Whisp; - Magic Anomaly; - Ice Wraith;
- Hagraven; - Daedra;

[b][color=yellow]Magic Possibilities:[/color][/b]
- If you block with a Silver Weapon, you can Block some Magic.
(With Deadly Combat this is quite strong, because you can time Ward a Spell and it Reflects back to his caster.)

[b][color=yellow]- Attack with Silver Weapons:[/b][/color]
* 40 P (from a Combat Hit Spell) of extra Damage to Magical Creatures and the Undead. (+40P of Dam from Orig. Perk)
* Decrease the physical resistance of the Enemy by 25% for 10 Sec
* 60 Points of extra Critical Damage

[b][color=yellow]- Bashing with Silver Bows or Shields:[/b][/color]
*10 Points of Extra Damage to Magical Creatures and Undead;
*Decrease the physical resistance of the Enemy by 25% for 10 Sec;
*Slows the Target down by 25% for 5 Sec.

[b][color=yellow]- Fighting with Silver Gauntlets:[/b] [/color]
* without any Weapon equipped does 20 Points of Extra Damage to Magical Creatures and Undead

Every hit with a Silver Weapon on Creatures, influenced by Silver, is now shown. The creature will have steam all around it.

[color=Green][b][size=3]12.Silent Moons Forge[/size][/b][/color]

In the Silent Moons Camp there is a Forge. A note said, that you can forge here at Night special Weapons, that do at Night extra damage to all foes. Now it is for real.

[b][color=yellow]1.[/b] [/color] I changed the Magic Effect to do damage instead of swinging the Weaon faster.
[b][color=yellow]2.[/b] [/color] Between 9 PM and 5 AM you may forge Silent Moons Weapons only in the Lunar Forge
[b][color=yellow]3.[/b] [/color] The Weapons you may forge are:
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] all Iron Weapons with the Textures from [color=green][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42079/?] by Elgar [/url][/b][/color]
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] all Ancient Nord Weapons (only forgeable in the MoonForge) with the Textures from [color=green][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2525/?] Runed Nord Hero Weapons by Kealen [/url][/b][/color]
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] all Steel Weapons
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] all Elven Weapons with the Textures of [color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2052/?]Ethereal Elven Equipment by fume0101[/url][/b][/color]
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] all Glass Weapons with the Textures from [color=green][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42079/?] Allannaa Stained Glass Weapons and Arrows by Allannaa [/url][/b][/color]
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] all Daedric Weapons with the Textures of [color=green][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11167/?] Daedric Blue Weapons by Iceburg [/url][/b][/color]
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] all Iron, Steel and Glass Weapons from the 3rd Era
[b][color=green]- [/b] [/color] The Raven Swords: 2 Handed and One-Handed
[b][color=yellow]4.[/b] [/color] There is a Silent Moons Chest with the Book, that teaches you to forge The Weapons Of The 3rd Era and some Ingots and Soulgems. So you can beginn forging at the start.


[color=Green][b][size=3]13. Installation[/size][/b][/color]

[b][color=yellow]Install[/b][/color]
1.Extract file
2.Copy content of the file in your Skyrim\Data
3.Open the Skyrim launcher / Nexus Mod Manager and check the 04PapaTimm_Archery.esp
4. You should start a NEW GAME, if you want, that everything is working perfectly. It is the problem of the abilites of Races. Somehow every new ability or change of an ability does only appear with a new game started. Maybe someone has another idea (without Scripts).

[b][color=yellow]Updating[/b][/color]

From Version 1.05 - 1.06 you have to remove with the console a Spell. Without that, the changes of the Perks will not carry over. Do not ask me, why this is. It seems to be, that the Perks can only be changed, by stealing them from the char, to give them back after.

1. Open console ^
2. Type: Help UniversalPerk2 0
3. you get now a Number behind the Lines: Spell UniversalPerk2 NUMBER
4. Type: player.removespell NUMBER
5. Sleep or Wait for 24 Hours (I Think, that must not be done. It works without sleeping to, but it will deactivate all active effects. Can not hurt)
6. Save and start the Game new. After starting new, you have the new Perks activated. And it works.


[b][color=yellow]Uninstall[/b][/color]

[b]1.[/b] Open the console ( press ~ )
[b]2.[/b] type this: [color=red][b]set PT_ArcheryUnIn to 1[/b][/color]
[b]3.[/b] Close the console
[b]4.[/b] Wait 24 Hours to deactivate all active effects
[b]5.[/b] Save and exit Game
[b]6.[/b] Delete 04PapaTimm-Archery.bsa
[b]7.[/b] Delete 04PapaTimm-Archery.esp
[b]8.[/b] Load game and Save again → exit game


[color=Green][b][size=3]14. Compatibility[/size][/b][/color]

[b]PapaTimm - Archery&Combat[/b]
This mod is not compatible with mods, that change
- One Handed Perk Tree and Perks
- Two Handed Perk Tree and Perks
- Light and Heavy Armor Perk Tree and Perks
- Archery Perk Tree and Perks
- Bows, Arrows, Crossbows and Bolts
- Silent Moons Camp
- Bracers and Gauntlets
- Level Lists of Weapons
[b][color=yellow]- Any Race Mod that changes the folloing Spells:[/b][/color]
[color=Green]*[/color] RaceKhajiitClaws [color=Green]*[/color] RaceBreton [color=Green]*[/color] RaceNord [color=Green]*[/color] RaceDarkElf [color=Green]*[/color] RaceRedguard [color=Green]*[/color] RaceWoodElf [color=Green]*[/color] RaceOrcBeserk [color=Green]*[/color] RaceImperial [color=Green]*[/color] RaceArgonianResist Disease [color=Green]*[/color] abHighElfMagicka

I had to add all the changes as a Perk to all Races. I did not want to change the Race itself, so it can be compatible with Race mods. Some Racemods change those spells above. So they are not compatible.
You can always load my mod after the Race Mod and it will work. But I do not know, what it overwrites from the Race Mod. Normaly the Race mods add their own Spells to the race and change only the Resistance in the RaceSpells.

In order to make the mod „Script Free“ I had to add the Perk to all playable races. I wanted, that all NPCs have the same advantages and disadvantages. If you want to have a Race mod, that is compatible with this look down under Recommended.


[color=green][b]Make your Mod Compatible:[/b][/color]

In the game there are so many Keywords programed but not used. I used some of them.
Add those Keywords to your Weapon, Spell or Recipe to make your mod compatible.

[b]Bows and Arrows[/b]
Long Bows Keyword: -
Long Arrow Keyword: TraitPowerHungry
Short Bow Keyword: JobFletcher
Short Arrows Keyword: TraitGreedy

[b]Weapons[/b]

WitchHunterWeapons Keyword: JobMinstrel

[color=yellow]Throwing Weapons / One Handed Crossbows[/color] Keyword: MothNest2

[color=white]Silent Moons Weapons[/color] Keyword: Job Apothecary
[color=white]Star Dust Weapons[/color] Keyword: TGMark
[color=red]Mage Staff Fire[/color] Keyword: JobCourtWizard

[color=purple]Mage Staff Lightning[/color] Keyword: BookShelfLastBook
[color=green]Mage Staff Nature[/color] Keyword: MothNest1

[b]Spells[/b]

[b]Crafting Stations[/b]

]Unofficial Skyrim Patch by Unofficial Patch Project Team [/url][/b][/color]:
[color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23491/?
]Unofficial Dawnguard Patch by Unofficial Patch Project Team [/url][/b][/color]:
[color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31083/?
]Unofficial Dragonborn Patch by Unofficial Patch Project Team [/url][/b][/color]:
[color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25127/?
]Unofficial Hearthfire Patch by Unofficial Patch Project Team [/url][/b][/color]:

[color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19403/?
]Killing traps by Hexaae [/url][/b][/color]:

[color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38488/?
]Deadliest Dragons by TRAVIESO [/url][/b][/color]: Because this just makes fun. Dragons are harder, no Scripts are used and you have to think, what is the best weapon against a dragon. I tested many Dragon mods, but this is the most fun!

[color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10175/?
]SkyTEST - Realistic Animals and Predators by EtaYorius [/url][/b][/color]: My mod is fully compatible with this mod. It is a perfection!

[color=green][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40171/?
]Druid Spells - Sun Moon and Star by Shadowblade001 [/url][/b][/color]: If you are using my Enemies Module, you need some things against the Undead. This mod is really fun! I use it. I know there are Scripts, but I use it!!!

You should also use a Mod, that makes Creatures Harder, if you do not use my Module [color=green][b][size=4][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55562/?
]Papa Timm - Enemies and Races[/url][/size][/b][/center][/color]
author: James_T_G

files.name: Papa Timm Archery And Combat
files.changelogHtml:
Reworked the Light Armor Gauntlets Bonus.
Added new Hat and Masks from "Ancient Blades Weapons by COTS" and updated it.
Some minor changes to hidden Perks. Some of them where to strong.
